title: Negligible number of women CXOs at India's top auto cos, says Deloitte study
description: Executives at companies like Mercedes-Benz, Tata Motors, MG Motor India and Hero MotoCorp told ET they are stepping up focus on women participation in leadership positions. At Tata Motors, the countryâ€™s third largest PV maker and largest CV manufacturer by sales volume, there were 4.9% women in top management positions as of December 31. Across all management levels, from junior to top management, only 7.43% were women.
